item.title: On-device Sora: Enabling Diffusion-Based Text-to-Video Generation for Mobile Devices
item.description: On-device Sora makes high-quality, diffusion-based text-to-video generation possible on smartphones, overcoming computational and memory limitations through novel techniques.
